text: In Marxism, the Lumpenproletariat ("rag-proletariat" in German) refers to a class of people at the lowest level of society who do not have class consciousness but tend to be criminals or unemployable. ==Public views== Some left-wing activists believe that the lumpenproletariat the "most exploited" class of people and therefore the most revolutionary, but others think that they cannot be organized into revolutionary forces and are more likely to be paid agents who are hired to stop revolution. ==References== Category:Society Category:Marxism Category:Pejoratives Category:Social classes
title: Lumpenproletariat
